Fountain.GROUNDDESC: A magnificent fountain has a basin filled with blue-tinted water.
Fountain.LONGDESC: A large tiered stone fountain stands before you, you have no clue how it came to be here next to a cliff face. The water looks slightly odd and you think you see tinges of blue in it.
Fountain.DRINKDESC: You lap up some cool water from the fountain, it has a grimy aftertaste and seems oddly cool.
Fountain.EATDESC: There isn't really a way to eat that.
